website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful electric fireplace that looks realistic, performs well, and is available in color options to fit most home decor.
pros: Owners absolutely love the 3D fire effect, and the blower sends out adequate heat as a secondary source
Features attractive, realistic looks with intricate floral trim
cons: Some units arrived with broken components
Assembly can be challenging and a bit time-consuming

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!!! Living in the mountains brings very cold and chilly days and nights. The fireplace warms the room and looks awesome. It is a beautiful addition to my sun room!!!! Recommend this fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cottle

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this fireplace style heater.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and once assembled looks as pictured. This fireplace style heater is a perfect fit for our living area. It’s beautiful. The mantle, faux flames and log look great. We love the etched wood style look, the temp settings and remote. My cats even enjoy it. It heats up the room quickly and efficiently. My room mate put it together easily in a couple hours. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday...assembly didn't go so well, the screws split the wood (it's not really wood) but I called SEI Customer Service & they are sending replacement boards. They were very nice as well. My dogs have not moved since putting the fireplace in. Only have had the flames on / no heat yet. The timer is fabulous! I set the timer for 30 minutes & fell asleep with my room aglow. I would recommend this fireplace, not too big as the others I had found at Big Lots.
customer_reviews.author: Shop_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and cozy for any room.
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is more beautiful in person than it is in the picture. My husband and I use it day and night. Just enough warmth and gives a very relaxing and cozy ambience to the room. Worth every penny we spent! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful!!! Very easy to put together, took me about 1/2 an hour. I love, love, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrrell1

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful!😍
customer_reviews.text: I love the deep brown color. The fire feels calming. My son assembled it in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my new fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Love my new fireplace, perfect size for the wall. Assembly wasn't too difficult (68 yr old woman and I did it myself). Product was boxed VERY well, but still have several chips and dings - I'll just touch up with a little paint and no one will notice. Fire looks real and it certainly pours out heat, can't wait for winter to use.
customer_reviews.author: sher in MO

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good
customer_reviews.text: When I saw how much assembly was to be done, I was a bit concerned, but it went pretty smoothly. My only issue is that the mdf is loose enough that in a couple of spots the screws used to attach the top didn't have much to grab onto before you could feel them starting to slip. Fortunately, that was the top, which will be held in place by gravity and it was only a couple of the 7 or 8 screws that had that problem. Other than that, it went together easily and my mother in law is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Kitts

customer_reviews.title: The Fireplace is beautiful and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the purchase from Amazon that has quality items from other companies. I’m very happy with it but the only thing I don’t have is the remote. I didn’t think about buying a remote but I’m extremely happy with it . Found out it did not come with a remote control. Still satisfied! Thank you Amazon ! Margaret L Sanchez
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of having little ones & went all out for this one. LOVE it. So beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Y. DeFroscia

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Read your reviews and know what you’re getting.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Read your reviews, use your tape measure, and know what you’re getting. Up close the fire looks very fake but from the couch it’s very charming. Looks even better with the room lights off. I loved the price and the fact that it was offered with no interest payments. Heater works great for our space. I put it together without any trouble before my husband got home from work. Both boxes arrived on the same day and one day earlier than scheduled. There was an odor for the first few weeks. I am pretty scent sensitive but mostly just smelled it when I walked in the room. Ian considering ordering a second one for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: VBBMI

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved to a new home in a new state, my old house had a fireplace and I missed not having one, especially at Christmas as my grandchildren have always hung their stockings up, so this was the prefect answer. Its is a beautiful addition to my living room, the remote makes it easy to operate, and it heats the room nicely even with the high ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the looks of this!
customer_reviews.text: This looks so good in my library! I have white shelves and it looks like it was built to match. I read a review where a lady said she put it together in 30 minutes, so I thought it would be a breeze. Not so. But my husband helped me and we got it done in about 2 hours. I love it and think it was worth the effort. Took a video so you can see the flames working. It’s so neat that you can run the flames without the heater. I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Love this fireplace
customer_reviews.text: After much hunting,I was in love with this fireplace.It is ivory,and I knew that.I bought with intentions of spray painting white.It arrived on time,2 boxes.The boxes were in great shape,minus one area.The packaging was very thorough,pieces were well protected.The fireplace had no shipping damage,but did have multiple black scuff marks.Again,I intend to paint,so no big deal,if I wasn't,it may have caused me to send back.I assembled it by myself.I did not put fire box in it yet,but I did test it,and I think it looks great for faux logs.I can't wait to paint it,and add it to our new entertainment wall.Over all excellent experience,for it's intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Callari

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this fireplace a little over two months ago. For the past three weeks, I have been unable to use it. I turn it on and increase the heat until the blower kicks on (about 72°) and then the thing just starts beeping!! The beeping error will not stop until I unplug the fireplace... Hence me being unable to use it... After only two months of use, I am one very dissatisfied customer. I paid well over $400, and this is crazy!!! I would like my money back or a replacement or some help with my problem!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. With a little assistance
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, design, and price of this fireplace but the color was off for us. With all the color variations in the review pictures I was hoping it was closer to white than the weird yellow but unfortunately it wasnt. :( So hubby spray painted it with primer spray paint(we tried paint but the glossy finish made it hard to paint) and we love the results. Nice size and very elegant looking. The fire place works well and it didnt take long to out together. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: JDOT R

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking, assembly not easy, AND after use of altogether about 30 days, blower is out
customer_reviews.text: This is a fab looking unit, however some of the holes did not quite line up, so assembly was difficult. Puts out good heat and overall we are happy. Added note, Blower stopped working after about 30 days.....thats not good, it looks good and lights up but no heat coming out and the vents are clean.
customer_reviews.author: Myeuropeantouch

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I have been enjoying this fireplace. The materials used, however, leave a little to be desired and it doesn’t look as nice as I thought it would. More importantly, the flame action isn’t very realistic, but it’s probably as good as you get at this price point. Assembly took about an hour, by an experienced handyman, but there was a lot of chatting throughout, so could probably be done faster. Remote control works fine and is easy to use. If I were to buy another fireplace, I’d spend (a lot) more money to get a more realistic one; I’m hooked on the electric fireplaces!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hallock

customer_reviews.title: Cozy lil space heater
customer_reviews.text: Nice little electric fireplace. The unit is very nice. The flames are adjustable, as well as the embers, and there is a light that also can be turned on to make the logs easier to see. Cool that it has a thermostat and timer as well. Easily controlled with a remote. A little smaller than I expected but it fits into the space well. Takes a bit of work to assemble but it's not complicated at all. I haven't turned on the heat yet but I will update the review as I start to use it. Excited to make my fall a little cozier.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, cozy fireplace, I'm thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything ❤ about this fire place! It's perfect for my casual romantic beach themed living room. It only took about 2 hours to assemble today, even with a curious dog and two crazy cats wanting to play with the packaging and boxes. The remote works great to control the beautiful flames, logs, and heat. I briefly tested the heat.( I have the AC running today because it's hot outside, but my test for the heater went great.)I'm looking forward to many cozy evenings next to this fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: Beth A.

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient assembly instructions!  Needs a video to help with assembly,.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible assembly instructions typical of Asian imports especially for items made in China! Looking forward to the day I can purchase American made products again!!! Happy to pay twice the price for items made in the US !
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gngery

customer_reviews.title: no directions just 2nd grade pictures
customer_reviews.text: its very nice but someone should warn you ..its cheap on directions and the way its suppose to click together blaze
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Attractive fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful looking fireplace and was very easy to construct. I had to replace one part due to a crack but the customer relations team were great to work with and promptly sent out the replacement part. I would definitely recommend to anyone considering purchasing this fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service and Warranty Reaction was Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed their product, looks wonderful and produces good heat. They resolved an issue involving a replacement part with a lot of grace, express sending the replacement to me within 2 days. Excellent customer service, great product! Looks great in my living room where there's a cold spot.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Williams

customer_reviews.title: My Beautiful Room
customer_reviews.text: I love how this takes the beauty of my bedroom up to a whole new level. It is such a gorgeous fireplace. I use the mantel for candles and photos. I plan to get a little love seat so I can sit in front of it. In California, electric heat is expensive so I won't be heating the room with it very often but I love the flickering flames. It's exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Gentille

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful quality. It only took me a couple hours to assemble for my sister. The directions are very detailed and easy to follow. It was extremely well packaged, and delivery was right as stated. Oh , by the way I am a woman, if I can do it anyone can do it.
customer_reviews.author: PSB

customer_reviews.title: Love this fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I love how the fireplace was easy to assemble and everything fit like it should. It looks great in our living room. I would recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Survived moving and looks great
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Two years later I must admit that I stand corrected. This fireplace has survived two moves and still looks like new. It’s a higher quality than I originally thought. I can blame the initial broken pieces on the shippers rather than the manufacturers. Original review: The wood mantle is so poorly made. When it arrived, the two biggest pieces (the base and the top) were broken and we had to get them replaced. The rest of it isn't broken but feels flimsy and cheap. Only reason not a 1 star is because the customer service was great and it was easy to replace the broken parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cream color
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, love the details. Took about 90 minutes to put together, works nice, hope continues to work good, I seen 2 people had a problem. But one had it fixed. I think it was worth the money looks like worth more than hen paid.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Faberlle

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: We live in the south and while the functionality of a real fireplace is quite unrealistic the charm and coziness is something I always wanted. So this is what my husband got me for Christmas this year (a little early) and I am VERY happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: fleopatratexas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high quality easy to assemble fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new beautiful fireplace. I assembled it by myself (58 yr old woman) in about 45 minutes. It was so easy with great instructions. The color is ivory, perfect for my shabby chic bedroom. Very high quality look and feel to the wood. You can adjust the flame size and the brightness of the logs separately with the remote. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: T. P.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT buy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! This was very easy to assemble. The instructions were some of the easiest/clearest I've ever used. Total unpacking and assembly was under 45 minutes. Only need a Philips screwdriver for assembly. My mother is happt to have such a nice looking fireplace. Just the right amount of heating and she is thrilled that there is a no heat setting so she can have the ambience whenever she wants!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful, easy to assemble, gives off great heat. Love the remote to adjust, temperature, flame, log light and light inside the housing. We burn a “camp fire” candle and it’s as close to a real fireplace as you can get! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline A. Bush

customer_reviews.title: The fireplace is great, just love it. The company is amazing as well.
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a fireplace and this adds so much character to the room. It is now a cozy and relaxing area. I looked for a long time for a fireplace that was beautiful but affordable. I am so happy. The company got right back to me when I had a question.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love the features and flames
customer_reviews.text: I love this mantle and electric fireplace. I have it in my basement in front of the "real" fireplace. It covers the "real" fireplace well. I love the remote control. I love the heat with a thermostat. I love the "flames." My dogs and cats like it too. It seems to calm all of us. In the photo, that black blurry thing on the right is my cat jumping down from the "hearth."
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: More for Visuals
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely beautiful for my small home. Fairly easy to assemble. Things were labeled wrong but thankfully we figured it out. Can only feel the heat from it if you are directly in front of it. Wish it made a crackling noise but instead it just makes a blower noise.
customer_reviews.author: brianna morley

customer_reviews.title: Not true to color
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the color. It was very yellow hued. I returned the item
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Greenstein

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Clean looking, sturdy, easy to assemble, good amount of heat, and the flames look nice especially at night. This fireplace is larger than others, was priced considerably lower all similar units and cabinet units. Paid $385.
customer_reviews.author: OhioGuy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fireplace. A bit hard to put together, but the end result, it’s totally worth it. It produce a good amount of heat too. I would totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: valentina1978

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive addition to my home, which sadly, doesn’t have a fireplace. I struggled a bit with assembly, but was able to make it work after some missteps. The insert works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Room Temperatures
customer_reviews.text: In our Southern climate, this free-standing electric fireplace takes the chill off the room on a cool Winter morning. It is a great alternative to gas fire logs which are smelly and require so much attention.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W Beguin

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were only pictures and hard to follow Once put together it looks like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble. 13 screws needed to put front together and none of the holes were predrilled. Needed electric drill to assemble. Definitely needed 2 people. Instructions were only pictures and hard to follow Once put together it looks like the pictures. I wouldn't get it again but too much trouble to take apart and return. Made in China and priced too high .. ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great... sturdy... but flame and logs do look very fake and shallow
customer_reviews.text: I mean maybe there's a way to DIY some more authentic looking wood because it is especially fake looking inside the window. But overall price and size are amazing and I may buy one for living room and another bedroom.. that says a lot
customer_reviews.author: Dave Chu

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Pretty. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is beautiful. It was easy to put together. Took me about an hour. Lots of different functions for flame intensity, heat intensity. Instructions are very easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: RenRen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fireplace for my bedroom. It arrived on time, meticulously packaged and free of damage. Immediately I read the directions and located my Phillips and flathead screwdrivers along with my drill. The directions were easy to follow. I, by myself assembled the fireplace in no time. It s a quality product, truly lovely and great compliment to my room. It is a great value for the money and certainly looks like I paid more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great style & value for the dollar!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting an attractive & useful fireplace for the huge wall in my new apt. This SEI fireplace is just decorative enough, has a lovely flame, & the dimensions fit the wall perfectly! I watched the how-to video when I purchased the fireplace, and when it came I was able to assemble it in 2 hours. I’m very satisfied at this point with my purchase. When winter comes I’ll get to see how the heat function works. I would recommend this fireplace to anyone looking!
customer_reviews.author: Ariane Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is very well made and the company has great customer service. After only two days our puppy chewed up the remote. I called to order another remote and they offered to send a new one at no charge. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gocanes62

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for little nook space.. if you put it on a small wall it is best esthetically bc it is small. I am 5ft 4 inch and it comes up to my chest in height
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is amazing for the price. The mantle is rich and elegant. The fireplace has many features for flame size, heat, etc. Also, the flames do have a look of realism. As for assembly, I was able to do it by myself. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fireplace and fantastic customer service from this company, extremely responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: First of all the packaging was so top quality. Easy to follow instructions. All the peices look perfect. So pretty and is perfect for a TV stand. This was my birthday present to me and I could not be happier with my choice! You must get this!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to living room, being able to set it on a timer is a plus, looks great, wonderful heating properties, quiet, efficient and a save on electric, and my 3 kats enjoy sleeping in front of it; ty
customer_reviews.author: francisca mesiano

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. The heater, lighting and flexibility in choosing these works wonderfully. The pieces were all carefully labeled, though it definitely takes two people to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Love this fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Love this fireplace. It was easy to put together. I put it together in an hour or less with no help. It was actually really fun to work on. Beautiful and well worth the money. The color is really cream, but looks perfect in my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Works well for an apartment.
customer_reviews.text: Had the fireplace for a few months and it is functioning as expected. The Ivory color is nice and the fireplace does put off heat that is ideal for an apartment. Assembly took longer than expected but the instructions were accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: This took me about a half an hour or a little longer to assemble, and I did it all by myself! I couldn’t be happier with the process and finished product. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: gobstopperstrudel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We used this in our master bedroom and it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect fireplace!!! Easy to assemble and looks great. Packaged very good and delivered with ease. Don’t be afraid to order this fireplace is just the right size for a smaller house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Looked forward for this fireplace,but assembling was not that easy.One of the screws was alrefy broken so we couldn’t tighten it.It makes a noice like a engine on the boat,peddaling.I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Shea

customer_reviews.title: Value for how perfect it is
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace not only was one of the cheapest or should I say lowest price but it’s perfect. I wouldn’t have asked for anything different. It’s beautiful, small but not too small and it’s effective. Extra bonus that it’s white and did I mention the lowest price around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful addition to any room!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this fireplace on faith and am I glad I did! It is even more beautiful when you put it in a room and added that little extra touch my living room needed. My husband was able to put it together in less than a half hour. The heating element is lovely too and you can make it brighter or dimmer as you desire. It gives off very nice heat. Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace, awesome function and form!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece...easy to assemble, very simple to work and the remote is very handy if you're lazy. It looks amazing in a master bedroom, with a flat screen above it.
customer_reviews.author: Norvana

customer_reviews.title: Item is easy to put together even for a girl
customer_reviews.text: Item is easy to put together even for a girl! Took about 1.5 hours looks beautiful and solid. Just need two people to put the insert in. It came in two boxes and was well packaged. Not sure about the electric usage yet but like the fact you can use the flames and logs separate from the heat. Overall nice piece!
customer_reviews.author: Daily Reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect electric fireplace and very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this fireplace. It was easy to assemble and is beautiful. It came in earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Who Dat

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really love this fireplace. Quality is great for price. Placed it in my bedroom and love the remote to control without getting out of bed. I definitely recommend if you are looking for one to put in a smaller room. In a large room it may look too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fireplace! Beautiful and good quality! Received quickly. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: I love this fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I love this fireplace! It added so much to my room. Looks much more expensive than it was. Detail is so lovely. Many compliments and although it doesn't give off a great deal of heat, it makes you feel comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Oddo

customer_reviews.title: Love this fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Love this fireplace! We have it in our living room under our TV. Really gives ambiance to the room. The carved wood look is quite impressive
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Lara

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandmother for Christmas she is in love with this fire place and it looks so pretty
customer_reviews.author: Avenues

customer_reviews.title: Realistic fireplace...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Exactly what I wanted. Easy to put together which took about an hour. Everything was in tack and in working condition. Well made. Reasonably priced. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victorian Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good looking fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and add good heat. Assembly is average and only requires basic tools.
customer_reviews.author: Gold Star

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality. Extremely easy to assemble. I did it by myself in less than an hour. Gives off good heat. I get a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McCulskey-Darrah

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for our small living room.
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace has perfectly fit into our living room and has finished off the room. The finish on the fireplace is lovely and the colour is just what we wanted. It is so easy to use and gives a wonderful calm feeling to the room. We are so delighted to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Bani

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a real fireplace!!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of positive comments from guests when they see it in our front room!! Gives the room a cozy feel! Can't wait for Christmas when I can decorate the mantel with Christmas garland !!
customer_reviews.author: Kazza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my bedroom, the off-white or cream? color goes great with my mounding. This was easy to put together, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Malley

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant and very nice to look at very satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I put this together in about an hour. It’s beautiful and very realistic, it does give off heat and I have an open two story living area but still noticed the difference. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Just another customer.

customer_reviews.title: Bedroom Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this fireplace. So warm when the heater kicks on. Has a thermostat to set when you want it to turn on. Great purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Sanita D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just for Looks
customer_reviews.text: It’s very pretty but I wish it put out a little more heat.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, and we love the different settings/options
customer_reviews.text: Just what we are looking for. Nice color, and we love the different settings/options.
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: Love my fireplace❤
customer_reviews.text: I love this fireplace! It kicks out good heat. Great for the price. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: CozybytheFire
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful and looks like it does online. We needed an off white to match the rest of the furniture. I’m very pleased
customer_reviews.author: NinaT

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this fireplace. Just what I was hoping for. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Myabell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s awesome...smells strong at first ...easy to put together. Love it ...waiting for the insert
customer_reviews.author: Someone you’ll love to know

customer_reviews.title: Quality was first rate, design was just what we wanted, an excellent addition to our home.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design and the fireplace really enhanced the decor of our room.
customer_reviews.author: Abbycat2016

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased two units like this and I like this one the best
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two units like this and I like this one the best. It was easy to put together and only took about 20 minutes. It gives off more heat than I expected. It easily heats our 600 sf room.
customer_reviews.author: Nogrim

customer_reviews.title: Nothing not to like
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Reasonably priced. Packaged well with no damaged pieces. Instructions were easy to follow and it only took about half an hour to put together. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: It's absolutely beautiful and functional too
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely beautiful and functional too! The only issue I have with it is it does okay with heating but not all that great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Always get compliments on our fire place.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this fire place for over a year now. We always get compliments on it. The only problem I experienced was the dowels that came with the fire place were too small for the drilled holes. I had to replace the dowels with ones I had on hand. I don't know if it was just the unit I received that had the wrong diameter dowels, but if you're not handy, you may have problems assembling it. The fireplace really accents our room and has become the main focal point.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic piece of furniture. The detail is exquisite. Beautiful addition to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle McKenna

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We received this product and everything was there. Packaged perfectly. It was pretty easy to assemble, although you do need two people. The fireplace is fabulous and we are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Good value. Looks and works great. Love the LED flame effect. Check mall reviews on other fireplaces and this one i think is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: and like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: The product looks exactly as described, and like the pictures. Easy to install, if you installed furniture before - i only used an electrical screwdriver. It looks very good and is what i expected. It doesn't seem to yield a lot of heat, but that's ok with me. You can hear the fan, but it's not noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard Mihalascu

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with this plan on buying another for another room
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this plan on buying another for another room! Assembly was pretty easy and everything came in great condition! Love the off white brushed color!!
customer_reviews.author: Bri. B.

product_meta.title: SEI Furniture Calvert Electric Carved Floral Trim Fireplace, Ivory
product_meta.description: Rich is the perfect description for this traditional, creamy ivory fireplace. Fluted side columns and an elegant floral design across the mantel draw attention to this classic, electric fireplace. This beautiful mantel is finished off with understated molding that complements the design fabulously. The firebox has realistic, multicolor flickering flames and glowing embers with an interior brick design for a more lifelike look. This transitional fireplace is great for the living room and bedroom, and even adds a warm touch to the dining room or home office. This electric fireplace features energy efficient LED and requires no professional installation, making it a cost effective way to upgrade your living or media room. LED lights also offer optional down light illumination. Easy to use remote control offers 4-way adjustability to warm the room conveniently. Remote control adjusts thermostat, timer, logs, and flames separately. Safety features include automatic shutoff and glass that remains cool to the touch (safe, self-regulating heater turns off when desired temperature is met). Once powered off, logs and flames slowly turn down. Turn off the heat to enjoy the fireplace ambience year round! This wonderful piece offers supplemental heat for up to 400 square feet and conveniently plugs into a standard wall outlet a with 6' cord. Specifications: Temperature ratings: 62-82 degrees at 4 degree intervals; Heating/power: 120V/60Hz, 1500W, 12.5 Amps; Batteries: 1 CR2025, included. Dimensions includes: Overall: 44.5" W x 14.5" D x 40.25" H; Firebox front: 23" W x 20" H. This one-of-a-kind item approximately weighs 101 poundsand can support up to 50 pounds. Only quality materials and manufacturing will do. Product materials include: veneer, MDF, metal, glass, resin. Assembly required. Made in China.
feature_bullets: ELECTRIC SPACE HEATER –Produces and distributes radiant heat quickly, quietly and efficiently up to 400 square feet. A remote control separately adjusts the thermostat, timer, logs and life like flames creating a warm and cozy ambiance
FEATURES - Ivory finish combines with elegant floral trim for soft traditional style. Classic silhouette adds style to any living room or dining room
SIZE, WEIGHT – Free standing fireplace weighs 85 Pounds, Measures 44.5 inches wide, 14 inches deep, and 40.25 inches high
CONSTRUCTION - Assembly required, Material include veneer, MDF, metal, glass, resin

ENERGY EFFICIENT & SAFE – 1500 watt, 120v energy saving space heater. Safe self-regulating electric fireplace has protective glass that remains cool to the touch. The remote control comes equipped with a child safety lock
